text:
Foraker Labs. Boulder, CO.

We build stuff for clients as well as maintaining a couple of internal products. Our clients range from Breastcancer.org to local school districts.

Our products range from usability testing mobile web sites (http://www.uxrecorder.com/) to navigating traffic more efficiently (http://www.i70app.com/).

We're looking for developers experienced with both Ruby on Rails and JavaScript - http://www.foraker.com/careers/web-developer/

We're also looking for project managers - http://www.foraker.com/careers/jobs-project-manager-2014/
